fields.name: title
fields.label: Form Title
fields.description: Heading displayed at the top of the form (use a newline to split into two lines with gradient emphasis on the second)

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Form Subtitle
fields.description: Short description shown below the title
fields.value: We craft digital experiences that endure. Share the details below and our team will respond within one business day.

fields.name: redirect
fields.label: Redirect URL
fields.description: Optional page to navigate to after successful submission (link in row 3)
